content: this drapey lace cowl is perfect for transitional weather crossed stitches add interest and texture but keep it simple enough to be relaxing the cowl is written for adult sizes but instructions are given for lengthening or shortening the cowl instructions are also customizable for solid or colorblock patterns yarn used lang gordon or other dk or light worsted yarn about 350 yards it is highly recommended to choose a yarn with good drape wet blocking is recommended to open up the crossed stitch pattern for a lacy look
